activities:
As a Service Provider: Relias will collect personal data from individuals in order to create and maintain user accounts and records within its online learning management system.

As an Employer: Relias may at some point in the future employ individuals in the EEA and may transfer personal information concerning its current, former, and prospective personnel in the EEA to the U.S. in connection with the management and operation of the company, human resources administration, and safety and security processes.
personaldata: Off-line data, On-line data, manually processed data, human resources data
